pkgmetadata.longdescription: Backup directory tree and files. Full featured archiver with support for differential backups, slices, compression, ATTR/ACL support. DAR also supports Pipes for remote operations, including with ssh.

use.flag: Enable password hashing algorithm from app-crypt/argon2
Enables --enable-mode=32 option, which replace infinite by 32 bit integers
Enables --enable-mode=64 option, which replace infinite by 64 bit integers
Enables usage of asymmetric encryption algorithms
Enables linking with net-libs/librsync for delta compression support
